short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you working with feature toggles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Every time google chrome visit a website that match one of the supplied patterns, the extension will automatically add a new param to the url query string including the feature toggle.
